hero.title: Digital Transformation with
hero.description: Specialized consultancy in developing information systems projects that drive innovation and business efficiency through cutting-edge technologies.

about.label: Who We Are
about.title: Innovation and
about.description: At Bejuca Consulting we combine technical expertise with strategic vision to deliver solutions that make a difference in our clients' success.

mision.title: Mission
mision.description: Transform organizations through innovative technological solutions that drive their growth and competitiveness in the digital market.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To be regional leaders in digital transformation consultancy, recognized for our technical excellence and commitment to our clients' success.

valores.title: Values
valores.description: Innovation, integrity, excellence, and collaboration are the pillars that guide every project we undertake with our clients.

experiencia.title: Experience
experiencia.description: Over 15 years developing high-complexity technological solutions for companies across various industrial sectors.

history.title: Our History
history.p1: Founded in 2010 in Tucumán, Argentina, Bejuca Consulting was born with the vision of bringing emerging technologies to companies in the region. What started as a small team of technology enthusiasts has become a consultancy recognized for its technical excellence.
history.p2: Over more than 15 years, we have accompanied companies from various sectors in their digital transformation journey, from modernizing legacy systems to implementing cutting-edge artificial intelligence solutions.
history.p3: Our commitment to continuous innovation and customer satisfaction has allowed us to build lasting relationships and become a reference strategic partner in the market.

services.label: Our Services
services.title: Comprehensive
services.description: We offer a complete portfolio of technological services designed to drive your organization's digital transformation.

cta.title: Need a custom solution?
cta.description: Contact us and let's design the technology strategy for your business together.

methodology.label: Our Methodology
methodology.title: How We
methodology.description: We use proven and agile methodologies to ensure the success of each project, adapting to the specific needs of your business.

agile.title: Agile Methodology
agile.description: Scrum and Kanban for iterative deliveries and continuous adaptation to changes.

rapid.title: Rapid Development
rapid.description: Short development cycles that allow for quick validation and adjustment.

scalable.title: Scalable Architecture
scalable.description: Modular designs that grow with your business without compromising performance.

ci.title: Continuous Integration
ci.description: Automated CI/CD for frequent and reliable deployments.

benefits.label: Measurable Results
benefits.title: Benefits of working with us
benefits.description: Our results-oriented approach ensures that each project generates a tangible, measurable, and sustainable impact on your business over time.
items: Up to 40% reduction in operational costs

contact.label: Contact
contact.title: Let's Start Your
contact.description: Ready to transform your business? Contact us and let's discover together how technology can drive your growth.

form.successDescription: We will get in touch with you soon.
form.privacy: By submitting this form, you agree to our privacy policy.

footer.description: Specialized consultancy in digital transformation and artificial intelligence. We drive business innovation from Tucumán, Argentina.
